name: WIMI
tag_list: cloud, saas, tool, business, productivity, efficiency
overview:
Wimi help your business with a collaboration tool in the cloud to increase productivity and efficiency.

Wimi project management software allows you to create shared workspaces for each project. With Wimi, you centralize your projects’ data and benefit from a global and clear view over the progress of your current activities. Wimi combines powerful features that are keys to online project management. Wimi is a simple, intuitive and professional project management tool. With Wimi, your team share focused goals and you increase the productivity of your organization.

Wimi is an online collaboration software that allows you to work smarter and more efficiently on your different projects. Whereas it is collaborative work within a mission for a client or an internal activity managed by your teams, Wimi fits perfectly your needs and will seamlessly smooth the process. Online collaboration work boosts your teams’ productivity, and everybody is aligned with shared goals.
